beer.name: Morimoto Soba Ale
beer.description: The delicate flavor of our roasted Soba brings a nutty finish to this light and refreshing ale. A perfect accompaniment to lighter cuisine
beer.grains: Roasted Soba, Harrington, Metcalf, Munich & C-15.
Roasted Soba, Harrington, Metcalf, Munich & C-15.
beer.yeast: Rogue's Pacman Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.
